title: Eve L. Ewing - Breaking Down Structural Racism with “Ghosts in the Schoolyard”
itunes:title: Eve L. Ewing - Breaking Down Structural Racism with “Ghosts in the Schoolyard”
description:
Eve L. Ewing breaks down the history behind the racial divide in America’s schools and explains what gets in the way of giving every child a high-quality education.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
